title: Little devil teemo icon
body: So I played like 20 games and I have won 10. But my PC freezed and I quit. Do I still get the icon ?

replies.body:
You should, according to the [Official Page](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/skins/the-teemoing-2016). It can take *up to a week* for the Icon to be added to your account.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
Does the game have to be the gauntlet type or the other one?
You should be okay with winning *any doom bots match*. :)
I won a Doom bots of Doom(The Teemoing) on the 21st and still havn't receive my icon

Oh no! :(

We're still sending the icons out until Nov. 17th, so please let me know if you don't have it after then.
I have only one game on Doom Bots and it is win before 10 days and still don't have the icon :/
same here i won a game on the release date still no icon
The same here too. Right on the release date I played a game on Doom bots and i still don't have the icon :/
same here :(
same here too

sametrain {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

me too :c want this cute icon <3
:( I've won a few games on the Teemoing, I'll let you know if I get it or not  by Nov. 17th. Thanks for the help though
I have won only one doom bots match which was last week and I still have not gotten my icon, neither has my friend who has also won one match last week
I won a game in the Teemoing as well and never got the icon :({{item:3070}}

Hi Targons Blade (NA).

It's been over TWO WEEKS and I've won multiple matches on BOTH The Teemoing AND The Gauntlet but no Devil Teemo icon. This is bad considering that I'm a teemo main. (yeah i'm not proud of it, but i did what i had to do to get out of Bronze :/ )

Please look into my icon thank you.
{{champion:17}}
I have actually won a game of Doom Bots in both the Teemoing and the Guantlet and that was over a week ago yet still no little devil teemo icon. {{item:3070}}
But they said if u abandoned u will lose the icon
no, if you leave a game of Doom Bots, you don't get the Icon
Yeah I have already won 10 games of doom bots but last game in doom bots my Pc freezes so I quit.
then you should still get it
If you won a game without leaving, you should be fine. I believe leaving or disconnecting from a Doom Bots match should only prevent you from earning the Icon for the match you left, if you had won.
you just need to win one game of Doom Boots lol
i won multipe matches on both modes and still dont have the icon :/

I won a Doom Bots (The Teemoing) game sometime towards the beginning of the event, and still haven't received the devil Teemo icon. I just beat the same game mode again about an hour ago. Have the icons been released yet, and if so do I need to beat the gauntlet version of doom bots as well to receive the icon? Please someone let me know since the event ends on the 3rd.
Finally got the icon. Thank you, RIOT.

3 days after event, and still haven't received the Devil Teem Icon. Already surpassed a week since I completed the Doom Bots of Doom (The Teemoing), and I am pretty sure RIOT isn't going to do anything.
Still haven't received the Satanic {{champion:17}} icon. Am I just screwed now, RIOT. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

No panic guys :P
I got the icon just right now...
And i love it <3
I won a Doom bots of Doom like a week ago and still havn't receive my icon :(
I have not received my summoner icon either and I won one game.
I've won the second day doom bots was out and by now I have 18 or 20 wins :/ I still don't have my icon ;~;
i won 6 games and yet no icons and its been two weeks since i won them
I won a game as soon as doom bots released and I still have not gotten the little devil teemo icon :(

u get a teemo icon!!!!!!

how, tell me
win a doom bots of doom game

You don't win doom bot to get the teemo icon. U have to do the Revel the Teemoing and sacrifice more than 2000 minions :P to get that! While sacrificing the minions at 2000 Devil Teemo will appear with a message. After a week you get the icon :D
FYI. I only played 4 dooms and won only 1 match. But I did Clicked more than 2000 times over the revel :P and today I got my icon....and it was a week ago.

No, it's different between the servers. For Revel the Teemoing, we have to sacrifice 500+ minions for the Doomed Minion Icon. For the Little Devil Teemo Icon, we have to play Doom Bots and win at least one game in order to get it.

i had won some games, but I have quit one game before the game start. Can I still get the icon?
{{champion:131}}
i have quit before the game start, can i still get the icon since I have won the game?
no one answering?
i got the icon :)
